statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPDNSZone) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP DNS Zones that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPDNSZone)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPDNSZone-to-Project relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPRecordSet) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP DNS Record Sets that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPRecordSet)<-[r:HAS_RECORD]-(:GCPDNSZone) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GCPDNSZone-to-GCPRecordSet relationships that are out of date.

name: Cleanup GCP DNS Records and RecordSets
